resources.string: What do you want to learn today?

The eye is a part of the body that has a functions as a sense of sight and organ balance. Generally humans have a pair of eyes on the right and left.When we are sad, usually our eyes will release a clear liquid which wecall it cry.
The nose is a part of the body that has a function as the sense of smell (breathing).Generally, the nose has 2 holes and there are smooth hairs to filter the air.

The hand is a part of the body that acts as a means of movement.Generally, humans have two hands, namely the right hand and the left hand.On each of our hands there are 5 fingers that we can use to write and hold.

The mouth is a part of the body that acts as a place for food to enter and water. We also use the mouth as a tool to speak.Inside the mouth there is a tongue as a sense of taste and teeth to help chewfood.
The ear is a part of the body that acts as the sense of hearing. EarsIs also has a functions as an organ of balance along with eyes. Generally,humans have a pair of ears on the left and right.
